articles.content: Large mutual fund distributors are trying to poach clients from smaller rivals after the Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI) allowed commission to be paid to them if customers switch distribu… [+4503 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Flipkart to take on Zepto, Blinkit with quick commerce foray - Entrackr
articles.description: Flipkart has started ramping up infrastructure for its quick commerce play, three sources aware of the details of the plan told Entrackr.
